data.title: Diversion First Program Shares Continued Success with 2023 Annual Report
data.meta_description: Fairfax County, Virginia - Diversion First Program Shares Continued Success with 2023 Annual Report
data.text:
QUICK SUMMARY

Diversion First is an award-winning countywide initiative that offers alternatives to incarceration for people with mental illness, co-occurring substance use disorders and/or developmental disabilities.

The goal is to intervene whenever possible to provide assessment, treatment and/or needed supports.

Diversion First has resulted in thousands of diversions from potential arrest since its implementation in 2016.
